user.bio: I’m a final-year Software Engineering undergraduate at SLIIT, specializing in full-stack development. With hands-on experience in both frontend and backend technologies, I’m passionate about building innovative and user-friendly solutions. I’m constantly learning and excited to tackle real-world challenges in the tech industry.
user.who_am_i: I am Shanelka Pramuditha, a third-year Software Engineering undergraduate at SLIIT (Sri Lanka Institute of Information Technology), with a passion for building innovative and scalable software solutions. Currently, I am working as a Software Developer at PurePitch in the Netherlands, where I contribute to cutting-edge projects that leverage modern technologies to solve real-world problems.
user.description: With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend development, I specialize in creating seamless, user-centric applications. My expertise includes working with NestJS, Tanstack (React Table, React Query), React, Python, and JavaScript, among other technologies. I am adept at designing robust architectures, optimizing performance, and delivering high-quality solutions that meet both user and business needs.
